channel.title: Per Each Corner - Packfaces [Album]
channel.description: hey guys! I just released my two singles as a part of my new project called “Per Each Corner” so i made this songs and really got me worried whether they’re good or not. I’m really a rookie about music making so I just only made them for myself and suddenly shared them through soundcloud. So I’m kinda curious about what you guys think about these songs that I made. And the following days i’ll probably posting my other three tracks with the album. [https://soundcloud.com/packfaces/sets/per-each-corner](https://soundcloud.com/packfaces/sets/per-each-corner) ![image|500x500](upload://gSgRyRqrXWpv4TCpnjhse1hUFOt.jpeg)

item.title: Per Each Corner - Packfaces [Album]
item.dc:creator: packfaces
item.description:
hey guys! I just released my two singles as a part of my new project called “Per Each Corner” so i made this songs and really got me worried whether they’re good or not. I’m really a rookie about music making so I just only made them for myself and suddenly shared them through soundcloud. So I’m kinda curious about what you guys think about these songs that I made. And the following days i’ll probably posting my other three tracks with the album.
